translation.en: [Arin] It seems strange now,
translation.ja: 今(いま)ではふしぎだけど

translation.en: but remember when Ninjago was the only thing on the map?
translation.ja: ニンジャゴーが世界(せかい)の すべてだった時(とき)があった ニンジャゴーが世界(せかい)の すべてだった時(とき)があった それは突然(とつぜん)！　マージが 起(お)きた世界　(せかい)その１

translation.en: When it was our entire world?
translation.ja: ニンジャゴーが世界(せかい)の すべてだった時(とき)があった それは突然(とつぜん)！　マージが 起(お)きた世界　(せかい)その１ ニンジャゴーが世界(せかい)の すべてだった時(とき)があった

translation.en: I used to spend all my time trying to be like my heroes, the Ninja.
translation.ja: ぼくの夢(ゆめ)は ニンジャになることだった

translation.en: Practicing their moves, learning their poses...
translation.ja: 動(うご)きやポーズを練習(れんしゅう)し

translation.en: I wanted to be just like them. To protect everyone in Ninjago.
translation.ja: かれらみたいになって ニンジャゴーを守(まも)りたかった

translation.en: To ride dragons into adventure and mythical realms.
translation.ja: そして いつか伝説(でんせつ)にしか 存在(そんざい)しないふしぎな土地(とち)で

translation.en: Mysterious lands that could only exist in legend.
translation.ja: そして いつか伝説(でんせつ)にしか 存在(そんざい)しないふしぎな土地(とち)で ドラゴンにのって冒険(ぼうけん)する

translation.en: But I quickly found out those legendary realms are very real.
translation.ja: でも そのふしぎな土地(とち)は じっさいに存在(そんざい)した

translation.en: And I was about to lose everyone that was important to me.
translation.ja: 大切(たいせつ)な人(ひと)たちが のみこまれようとしていた

translation.en: My neighborhood must have been the very center of "The Merge."
translation.ja: ぼくの家(いえ)のまわりは まさにマージの中心(ちゅうしん)にあった

translation.en: But back then, we didn't know what to call it. -[screaming] -[Arin] It was just chaos.
translation.ja: でも当時(とうじ)は名前も(なまえ)しらず ただ おびえるだけだった

translation.en: Arin, get inside! It's too dangerous out there!
translation.ja: エリン　中(なか)に入(はい)って！ 外(そと)はキケンすぎる！

translation.en: -Arin! -[screaming continues]
translation.ja: エリン！

translation.en: [Arin] That's when my heroes, the Ninja, arrived!
translation.ja: ニンジャが現(あらわ)れたのは その時(とき)だった

translation.en: We were in so much danger, but I couldn't help but be excited.
translation.ja: ぼくはキケンの中(なか)で 興奮(こうふん)をおさえられなかった

translation.en: Hey, kid, you get lost?
translation.ja: ケガはないか？

translation.en: [Arin] Jay, the Lightning Ninja!
translation.ja: イナズマ系(けい)ニンジャ ジェイ！

translation.en: Kai, Fire Ninja!
translation.ja: 炎系(ほのおけい)ニンジャ　カイ！

translation.en: Cole, Earth Ninja!
translation.ja: 大地系(だいちけい)ニンジャ　コール！

translation.en: Zane, Ice Ninja.
translation.ja: アイス系(けい)ニンジャ　ゼン！

translation.en: Nya, Water Ninja!
translation.ja: ウォーター系(けい)ニンジャ ニャー！

translation.en: Lloyd,
translation.ja: ロイド！

translation.en: the Legendary Green Ninja!
translation.ja: 伝説(でんせつ)のグリーン･ニンジャだ

translation.en: [Lloyd] Hold on, kid.
translation.ja: つかまって

translation.en: Green Ninja, my parents are in that storm! You gotta save them!
translation.ja: グリーン･ニンジャ ママとパパをたすけて

translation.en: [Lloyd] That's what we're here for!
translation.ja: まかせてくれ

translation.en: [Arin] And that's when it happened.
translation.ja: その時(とき)だった

translation.en: As I saw my small neighborhood disappear and a new city show up on the horizon,
translation.ja: ぼくが住(す)んでた街(まち)が消(き)え 新(あたら)しい街(まち)が現(あらわ)れたのをみて

translation.en: I realized I had witnessed "The Merge" firsthand.
translation.ja: ぼくはマージを 目撃(もくげき)したんだときづいた

translation.en: The moment all the mysterious realms I had only heard about, merged with Ninjago,
translation.ja: 伝説(でんせつ)にしか存在(そんざい)しない土地(とち)が ニンジャゴーと合体(がったい)したんだ

translation.en: for reasons no one's been able to figure out.
translation.ja: 原因(げんいん)は だれにもわからない

translation.en: I survived, but I was alone.
translation.ja: ぼくは たった１人(ひとり)で のこされた

translation.en: My parents and everyone I ever knew had vanished.
translation.ja: 両親(りょうしん)もしりあいも みんな消(き)えてしまった

translation.en: [Arin] Mom? Dad?
translation.ja: ママ？　パパ？

translation.en: With my parents and home gone, I had to make a new life for myself.
translation.ja: すべてをうしない ぼくは新(あたら)しい生活(せいかつ)をはじめた

translation.en: Before, everyone I knew looked like me.
translation.ja: 前(まえ)にすんでた世界(せかい)とは ちがって

translation.en: Now I walk the streets with skeleton people,
translation.ja: 今(いま)はガイコツとともに 道(みち)を歩(ある)き

translation.en: buy food from snail people, sell pies to frog people!
translation.ja: カタツムリから食料(しょくりょう)を買(か)い カエルにパイを売(う)ってる

translation.en: And since the Ninja disappeared,
translation.ja: ニンジャが消(き)えた今(いま)

translation.en: I realized it's up to me to carry on their legendary tradition.
translation.ja: かれらの伝説(でんせつ)は ぼくが うけつぐしかない

translation.en: Arin, not to insult the dreams of my best new friend, but...
translation.ja: エリン　ディスりたい わけじゃないけど

translation.en: you are so not a Ninja.
translation.ja: あなたにニンジャはムリ

translation.en: [Arin sighs] How would you know, Sora? You didn't grow up with them like I did.
translation.ja: ソラ　キミは なにもしらないだろ

translation.en: All I need is a master to train me.
translation.ja: 師匠(ししょう)さえいれば なれるさ

translation.en: Sure! Ah, one problem. There are no Ninja Masters around anymore.
translation.ja: そうだとしても もうニンジャの師匠(ししょう)はいない

translation.en: [Arin] Hey, have you found what we need yet?
translation.ja: みつかった？

translation.en: I can only distract these dogs from making noise for so long.
translation.ja: 犬(いぬ)の注意(ちゅうい)をひくのも げんかいだ

translation.en: Uh, I don't have that many stories to tell.
translation.ja: 話(はなし)のネタがきれた

translation.en: Give me a second.
translation.ja: まってて

translation.en: Boom! And we didn't even set off the...
translation.ja: みつけた！　しかも…

translation.en: [security robots] Halt! Halt! Halt!
translation.ja: とまれ　とまれ　とまれ！

translation.en: [Arin] We should probably leave right about now.
translation.ja: にげたほうがよさそうだ

translation.en: I always like how you think.
translation.ja: いいね　その考(かんが)え

translation.en: [Arin] Oh, there's gotta be an easier way to get mechanical parts!
translation.ja: もっとかんたんに 部品(ぶひん)が手(て)に入(はい)らない？

translation.en: There is. It's called "having money."
translation.ja: 入(はい)るよ　お金(かね)さえあればね

translation.en: Which is not exactly our situation.
translation.ja: わたしたちにはムリだけど

translation.en: [Arin] After tomorrow it might be!
translation.ja: 未来(みらい)はわからない

translation.en: [security robots] Halt! Halt! Halt!
translation.ja: とまれ　とまれ　とまれ！

translation.en: [Arin] All right, then. Ninja...
translation.ja: いくぞ　ニンジャ…

translation.en: -You're not a ninja. -[Arin] Wannabe Ninja...
translation.ja: ちがうよ あこがれのニンジャ…

translation.en: Go!
translation.ja: ゴー！

translation.en: Rough landing. But you're getting better at that.
translation.ja: 着地(ちゃくち)は失敗(しっぱい) でも よくなってる

translation.en: -[Arin grunts] -Let's go!
translation.ja: いこう

translation.en: [grunts] Can you make a distraction?
translation.ja: 注意(ちゅうい)をひいて

translation.en: I don't think these bots want to hear my story about the Merge.
translation.ja: ロボットが ぼくの話(はなし)を ききたいか？

translation.en: Then do something else!
translation.ja: なんとかして

translation.en: [Arin] Up here!
translation.ja: こっちだ！

translation.en: You, garbage can!
translation.ja: ほら　ゴミばこくん！

translation.en: [security robots] Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.ja: ダンス　ダンス　ダンス！

translation.en: Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.ja: ダンス　ダンス　ダンス！

translation.en: I will never get over how quickly you can hack stuff like that.
translation.ja: すごいな　こんなにはやく ハッキングできるなんて

translation.en: What can I say? I'm just naturally good at tech stuff.
translation.ja: まあね 機械(きかい)いじりは得意(とくい)なの

translation.en: It's been like that since I was a kid.
translation.ja: 子(こ)どものころからね

translation.en: We might not have money,
translation.ja: お金(かね)はないけど

translation.en: but I'm sure the owners of this place would love one of my delicious homemade pies, right?
translation.ja: おいしい自家製(じかせい)パイで ゆるしてもらえるかな？

translation.en: As payment for the gear we're "borrowing."
translation.ja: 部品(ぶひん)をかりるお礼(れい)だよ

translation.en: Who doesn't love pie?
translation.ja: パイは みんなすきよ

translation.en: [security robots] Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.ja: ダンス　ダンス　ダンス！

translation.en: -[Sora] Hey, Mrs. R. -How's the wasp milk today?
translation.ja: Ｒさん 調子(ちょうし)はどう？

translation.en: Ooh, watch your step, Newt.
translation.ja: きをつけて

translation.en: [Sora] Hey! Watch where you're going!
translation.ja: ちょっと　あぶない！

translation.en: [Arin] I still can't get over how amazing the Kingdom of Imperium looks.
translation.ja: インペリウム王国(おうこく)って すごく美(うつく)しいよね

translation.en: It's perfect, isn't it?
translation.ja: カンペキだよ

translation.en: Don't believe everything you hear about Imperium.
translation.ja: うわさを信(しん)じちゃダメ

translation.en: I'm from there, remember?
translation.ja: 住(す)めば わかる

translation.en: Their idea of "perfect" isn't mine.
translation.ja: ヤツらのやり方(かた)には 賛成(さんせい)できない

translation.en: The Merge slamming it up against Ninjago gave me the perfect chance to get out.
translation.ja: マージのおかげで わたしは あそこから にげだせた

translation.en: And the perfect chance to meet me.
translation.ja: そして ぼくにも会(あ)えた

translation.en: I'd still like to go there someday. Or go anywhere.
translation.ja: ここじゃない場所(ばしょ)を 体験(たいけん)してみたいんだ

translation.en: I've never been out of my old neighborhood. Crossroads just grew up around the area where my house used to be.
translation.ja: ぼくはクロスロード以外の 場所(ばしょ)をしらないから

translation.en: You want to experience other places?
translation.ja: もう体験(たいけん)してるでしょ

translation.en: Look around!
translation.ja: まわりをみて

translation.en: [Sora] Why go anywhere when the best of all the realms have moved here to the Crossroads?
translation.ja: 最高(さいこう)のものがすべて ここに やってきたんだから

translation.en: For example, me.
translation.ja: たとえば わたしとかね

translation.en: I'm glad you came here, Sora.
translation.ja: ソラがいてよかった

translation.en: You're my BFF, my fam, but...
translation.ja: キミは ぼくの家族(かぞく)で親友(しんゆう)だ いくあてがなくて ここにいるヤツもいる

translation.en: some of us are only here because we had nowhere else to go.
translation.ja: いくあてがなくて ここにいるヤツもいる

translation.en: I understand, but you have to admit,
translation.ja: わかるけど― ペントハウスに住(す)めるって 最高(さいこう)だよ

translation.en: having our own penthouse is pretty cool.
translation.ja: ペントハウスに住(す)めるって 最高(さいこう)だよ

translation.en: Race you to the top!
translation.ja: 上(うえ)まで競争(きょうそう)ね

translation.en: [Arin] Last one there's a rotten egg!
translation.ja: お先(さき)に

translation.en: -Hey, that's cheating! -See you!
translation.ja: ずるい！ 上(うえ)で会(あ)おう！

translation.en: -Wouldn't wanna be you! -Careful, Arin,
translation.ja: 上(うえ)で会(あ)おう！ エリン　きをつけないと…

translation.en: -you're going too... -[clatters in distance]
translation.ja: エリン　きをつけないと…

translation.en: -[Arin] Dang it! -...fast.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: Yes! SA-Mark-1 is gonna crush in the Mech-Master 5,000!
translation.ja: ＳＡマーク１は メックマスター5000に勝(か)てる

translation.en: Tomorrow's race is the biggest prize pot of all time.
translation.ja: あしたのレースの賞金(しょうきん)は 史上最大額(しじょうさいだい)だ

translation.en: -If we win... -When we win.
translation.ja: 勝(か)てたら… 勝(か)つよ

translation.en: [Arin] Right, right, when we win,
translation.ja: だよね 勝(か)ったら すきな場所(ばしょ)に 住(す)むことができる

translation.en: we could find ourselves a real place to live.
translation.ja: 勝(か)ったら すきな場所(ばしょ)に 住(す)むことができる

translation.en: I could build my own Monastery and invite everyone else who lost their parents to live with us.
translation.ja: 道場(どうじょう)をたてて 両親(りょうしん)のいない 子(こ)どもたちと暮(く)らすんだ

translation.en: To carry on the tradition of the Ninja!
translation.ja: ニンジャの伝統(でんとう)を うけつぐために

translation.en: And I could design a real garage and lab.
translation.ja: わたしが そこに ガレージとラボを作(つく)れば

translation.en: And we wouldn't have to pay for parts with your pies anymore.
translation.ja: 部品代(ぶひんだい)がわりに パイを焼(や)かずにすむ

translation.en: [sighs] Another earthquake? It seems like they're happening more often.
translation.ja: また地震(じしん)？ さいきん多(おお)いきがする

translation.en: They never happened at all before the Merge.
translation.ja: マージの前(まえ)は めったになかった

translation.en: Hey, do you ever wonder if there's a greater purpose
translation.ja: なにかの意味(いみ)があるのかな

translation.en: for all of this? Like, a reason for the Merge?
translation.ja: なにかの意味(いみ)があるのかな マージがおきた原因(げんいん)とか？

translation.en: The Merge might have taken away everything you had, Arin,
translation.ja: マージは あなたから すべてうばったけど

translation.en: but it's given me everything I have.
translation.ja: わたしには多(おお)くをくれた

translation.en: Change can be scary.
translation.ja: 変化(へんか)はこわいけど

translation.en: But it's also a chance for something better.
translation.ja: 今(いま)より よくなる チャンスでもある

translation.en: The capture was successful?
translation.ja: 捕獲(ほかく)できたんだろうな？

translation.en: Of course! Transfer will begin first thing in the morning.
translation.ja: もちろんです あすの朝(あさ)イチで輸送(ゆそう)されます

translation.en: Your overconfidence is a weakness, Rapton.
translation.ja: 自信過剰(じしんかじょう)はおまえの弱点(じゃくてん)だ ラプトン

translation.en: These creatures are dangerous.
translation.ja: この生物(せいぶつ)はキケンだ

translation.en: Trust me, this thing isn't going anywhere.
translation.ja: どこにも にがしはしません

translation.en: Don't worry, Lord Ras.
translation.ja: ご心配(しんぱい)なく　ラズ様(さま)

translation.en: Do not disappoint me.
translation.ja: 失敗(しっぱい)はゆるさんぞ

translation.en: [claw 1] Lord Ras doesn't sound like he's got a lot of faith in us.
translation.ja: ラズ様(さま)は 信用(しんよう)してないようですね

translation.en: He's too uptight.
translation.ja: ピリピリしすぎだ

translation.en: We're the best there is at rounding up these animals.
translation.ja: われわれは しっかり管理(かんり)してる

translation.en: [in mocking voice] "Ugh, your overconfidence is a weakness."
translation.ja: “自信過剰(じしんかじょう)は おまえの弱点(じゃくてん)だ”

translation.en: [laughs] Let me tell you, I've never even heard the word "weakness."
translation.ja: 弱点(じゃくてん)なんて言葉(ことば)は きいたこともない

translation.en: [claw 1] Really? It's a pretty common word.
translation.ja: ホントに？　 よくある言葉(ことば)ですが

translation.en: No. I...
translation.ja: そうじゃなくて…

translation.en: I mean, I just don't know what that word means.
translation.ja: 言葉(ことば)の意味(いみ)がわからない

translation.en: [claw 1] Seriously? I... I can explain.
translation.ja: マジで？　では説明(せつめい)を

translation.en: Weakness, noun, the quality of...
translation.ja: 弱点(じゃくてん)というのは名詞(めいし)で…

translation.en: -[grunts] -Go away.
translation.ja: うせろ

translation.en: This guy in here?
translation.ja: こいつを―

translation.en: He ain't goin' nowhere, ain't ya?
translation.ja: カンタンに にがしてたまるか

translation.en: The last call to register for the Mech-Master 5000!
translation.ja: メックマスター5000の 参加登録(さんかとうろく)は いそいでケロ

translation.en: The greatest race...
translation.ja: このレースは…

translation.en: [Sora] In the history of the Crossroads.
translation.ja: クロスロード史上(しじょう) 最高(さいこう)のレース

translation.en: And we're here to win it!
translation.ja: わたしたちが勝(か)つ

translation.en: Sora! Arin!
translation.ja: ソラ！ エリン！

translation.en: Always happy to peep you two wild scamps.
translation.ja: やんちゃコンビに会(あ)えて うれしいケロ

translation.en: Up top!
translation.ja: ハイタッチ！

translation.en: Good to see you too, Mr. Frohicky.
translation.ja: わたしもよ　フロヒキーさん

translation.en: Wait. That's your mech?
translation.ja: まて　それが おまえたちのマシン？

translation.en: [chuckles] No offense, Sora, but, uh,
translation.ja: きをわるくしないでケロ

translation.en: not one of your more impressive builds, is it, hmm?
translation.ja: だが もっといいマシンが あったケロ？

translation.en: It's easily underestimated. Just like us.
translation.ja: 過小評価(かしょうひょうか)されてるだけよ

translation.en: Sure, but I've got top mechs from around the merged realms here.
translation.ja: だとしても ここには最高(さいこう)の マシンが集(あつ)まってるケロ

translation.en: Like an Underworld Mech.
translation.ja: 地獄(じごく)のマシンに…

translation.en: Freaky Leapy.
translation.ja: フリーキー･リーピー

translation.en: There's even a... uh, uh... [splutters]
translation.ja: それから… ええと　その…

translation.en: ...that thing.
translation.ja: あれも

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.ja: ロボロボ

translation.en: Oh, that's Lobbo! He's a good guy.
translation.ja: ロボだ　いいヤツだよ

translation.en: But, uh, never ask him about his mom. It's a... it's a very touchy subject.
translation.ja: でもママの話(はなし)はしちゃダメ デリケートな問題(もんだい)だから

translation.en: Plus, all the regulars.
translation.ja: さらには常連(じょうれん)メンバーも

translation.en: It could get pretty vicious.
translation.ja: はげしいレースになるケロ

translation.en: Maybe you should sit today's race out?
translation.ja: 今日(きょう)は やめたほうがいいケロ？

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. Then ante up!
translation.ja: わかったケロ　参加費(さんかひ)を

translation.en: I know you're not trying to pay your registration fees
translation.ja: まさか手作(てづく)りおかしなんかで 参加費(さんかひ)をはらおうとしてない ケロな？

translation.en: with baked goods again.
translation.ja: 参加費(さんかひ)をはらおうとしてない ケロな？

translation.en: So you don't want a fresh pie
translation.ja: まぼろしの ローストベリー入(い)りの

translation.en: filled with roasted snow-berries from the Never-Realm?
translation.ja: やきたてパイを 食(た)べたくないってこと？

translation.en: Fine. I guess we'll just have to toss it. Maybe the dogs are hungry.
translation.ja: じゃあ すてるしかないか 野良犬(のらいぬ)にあげよう

translation.en: Or maybe the raccoons?
translation.ja: アライグマでも

translation.en: Well, it'd be a shame to just throw it out.
translation.ja: 食(た)べものを粗末(そまつ)にしては いけないケロ

translation.en: Fine. [laughs]
translation.ja: わかったケロ

translation.en: Line up.
translation.ja: ならべ！

translation.en: Ha! They'll let anyone into these races, won't they?
translation.ja: このレースは だれでも 参加(さんか)できるみたいね

translation.en: At least we build our own gear, Kreel.
translation.ja: すくなくとも自作(じさく)だし

translation.en: We don't have a team of servants doing the work for us.
translation.ja: 召使(めしつか)いにつくらせた マシンじゃない

translation.en: They aren't servants! They're friend-ish people
translation.ja: 召使(めしつか)いじゃない　友達(ともだち)だよ アタシに献身的(けんしんてき)なだけ

translation.en: who work for me.
translation.ja: アタシに献身的(けんしんてき)なだけ

translation.en: They're here to cheer when I crush you! Like last time.
translation.ja: 前回(ぜんかい)と同(おな)じように ぶっつぶしてやる

translation.en: And the time before, and, checks notes...
translation.ja: たしか その前(まえ)も その前(まえ)の前(まえ)も…

translation.en: [gasps] Every single time.
translation.ja: 毎回(まいかい)ぶっつぶしてるんだった

translation.en: You kids don't learn.
translation.ja: すこしは学習(がくしゅう)すれば？

translation.en: Oh, we learn. But we just don't give up.
translation.ja: 学習(がくしゅう)するさ あきらめないだけだ

translation.en: And I might've designed a bit of an upgrade since the last race.
translation.ja: 前回(ぜんかい)より アップグレードさせたしね

translation.en: Come on, Arin. Let's get our fuel couplings attached
translation.ja: エリン　充電(じゅうでん)アダプターを とりつけよう

translation.en: while Kreel contemplates her impending loss.
translation.ja: クリールが動揺(どうよう)してるうちに

translation.en: I'm not worried.
translation.ja: してないってば

translation.en: [whispers] But just in case, loosen their cooling cable while they're gone.
translation.ja: 今(いま)のうちに冷却(れいきゃく)ケーブルを ゆるめておきな

translation.en: When they hit their turboboost, their engine will overheat
translation.ja: そうすれば発動(はつどう)と同時(どうじ)に エンジンがオーバーヒートし

translation.en: and explode. [evil laugh]
translation.ja: 爆発(ばくはつ)する

translation.en: Hey! Settle down in there!
translation.ja: おい　おとなしくさせろ！

translation.en: Nice try, you animal.
translation.ja: 悪(わる)あがきはおわりだ

translation.en: You can't...
translation.ja: おまえには…

translation.en: After that thing!
translation.ja: つかまえろ！

translation.en: Are we winning? I can't see. Tell me we are winning!
translation.ja: みえないんだけど勝(か)ってる？

translation.en: Not yet. Get the bumper arms up.
translation.ja: まだよ　バンパーアームを

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo on the move. Lobbo-lobbo!
translation.ja: ロボ　走行中(そうこうちゅう) ロボロボ

translation.en: We're coming for you, you fancy hatted ego-maniac.
translation.ja: おいぬいてやる ダサいぼうしの おねえさん

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.ja: つかまって！

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo avoids hazards. Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.ja: ロボ　障害回避(しょうがいかいひ) ロボロボ

translation.en: Hit the turboboost!
translation.ja: ターボを発動(はつどう)して

translation.en: No! We can only use it once! Saving it for when we really need it.
translation.ja: ダメ　本当(ほんとう)に必要(ひつよう)な時(とき)まで とっておく

translation.en: Those punks? Oh, no, they don't.
translation.ja: そんなことしてもムダよ

translation.en: We're in the straightaway.
translation.ja: 直線(ちょくせん)コースだ

translation.en: This has got to be the time to use the turboboost, right?
translation.ja: ターボを発動(はつどう)するなら 今(いま)だよね？

translation.en: -Right? -Yep!
translation.ja: オーケー

translation.en: Get ready to roll around in prize money, tossing it in the air and going "Whee-hee!"
translation.ja: 賞金(しょうきん)の山(やま)にねころんで お札(さつ)をバラまいてやる！

translation.en: Sora, go! We're so close!
translation.ja: ソラ　はやくいかないと

translation.en: We gotta go after that dragon.
translation.ja: ドラゴンをおう

translation.en: What? We need to win this race!
translation.ja: なんだって？　レースは？

translation.en: Those dragon hunters are the Claws of Imperium!
translation.ja: おそってたのは インぺリウムのヤツらよ

translation.en: If they catch that dragon... [groans] ...the things they'll do to him. [gasps]
translation.ja: つかまったら なにをされるか…

translation.en: Trust me, we have to stop them.
translation.ja: おねがい　とめなきゃ

translation.en: [Sora] Arin! What would the Ninja do?
translation.ja: エリン　ニンジャなら こんな時(とき)どうする？

translation.en: Let's save that dragon.
translation.ja: たすけにいこう

translation.en: -[grunts] Get up! Get up! -[Lobbo] Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.ja: おこしてよ ロボロボ

translation.en: Lobbo wins!
translation.ja: ロボ　勝利(しょうり)！

translation.en: Lobbo a success.
translation.ja: ロボ　大成功(だいせいこう)！

translation.en: See, Lobbo's mother?
translation.ja: やったよ　ママ

translation.en: Can a "malfunctioning tin can" do that?
translation.ja: “故障(こしょう)したブリキ缶(かん)”に できるか？

translation.en: Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.ja: ロボロボ

translation.en: No need to tell Ras about this minor slip up, understood?
translation.ja: ほんの手(て)ちがいだ ラズ様(さま)には いうな いいな？

translation.en: [Arin] Hop on, buddy!
translation.ja: ほら　のって！

translation.en: What? Who are these kids now? Get them!
translation.ja: なんだ あのガキどもは つかまえろ！

translation.en: [Arin chuckles nervously] Uh, looks like we're in another race.
translation.ja: こういうレースもアリかな

translation.en: Then good thing we've still got that turboboost ready to go.
translation.ja: まだターボも のこってるしね

translation.en: Uh, did one of us make that thing explode?
translation.ja: オレたちが爆発(ばくはつ)させたのか？

translation.en: I mean... [chuckles] I'm sure it was us, right?
translation.ja: もちろんオレたちだよな？

translation.en: [Rapton] Dragons are resilient. Our target will survive.
translation.ja: 回復力(かいふくりょく)があるから ドラゴンは平気(へいき)だ

translation.en: Those kids, not so much.
translation.ja: ガキどもは残念(ざんねん)だがな

translation.en: Let's get down there and drag the lizard off the pavement.
translation.ja: さっさとドラゴンを 回収(かいしゅう)しよう

translation.en: [claw 1] That's different than it was before, right?
translation.ja: さっきとは ずいぶん変(か)わってますね

translation.en: [Arin] How did you do all this?
translation.ja: どうやって これ全部(ぜんぶ)やったの？

translation.en: I honestly do not know.
translation.ja: わたしにも わからない

translation.en: But now's not the time for questions. It's the time for...
translation.ja: でも今(いま)は そんなことより…

translation.en: Now it's my turn!
translation.ja: ぼくの出番(でばん)だ！

translation.en: Self-trained Wannabe Ninja without a master, go!
translation.ja: 独学(どくがく)で修行(しゅぎょう)した あこがれのニンジャ… ゴー！

translation.en: Oh. Close enough.
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: Lord Ras, we were just about to...
translation.ja: ラズ様(さま)　ちょうど…

translation.en: You failed me.
translation.ja: 失敗(しっぱい)したな

translation.en: I do not like that.
translation.ja: おまえにはガッカリだ

translation.en: [Arin] Uh, do you know who this guy is?
translation.ja: キミのしりあい？

translation.en: -[Sora] No clue. -He doesn't seem very nice.
translation.ja: 全然(ぜんぜん) 味方(みかた)じゃなさそうだ

translation.en: What? How'd you...
translation.ja: どうやって…

translation.en: Arin!
translation.ja: エリン！

translation.en: You are just the first.
translation.ja: まず手(て)はじめに おまえだ

translation.en: Now, I'm going to hunt down your entire family.
translation.ja: そのあとで 一族全員(いちぞくぜんいん)をつかまえてやる

translation.en: Wherever they are.
translation.ja: かくごしろ

translation.en: Put the prisoners on the train. Quickly!
translation.ja: こいつらを列車(れっしゃ)にのせろ いそげ！

translation.en: I trust you won't have any more problems.
translation.ja: まさか これいじょう 問題(もんだい)があるのか？

translation.en: Yes, Lord Ras. I mean, no, Lord Ras.
translation.ja: はい　ラズ様(さま) いえ… ありません

translation.en: What do you think they'll do to us?
translation.ja: どうなるのかな？

translation.en: Whatever it is, they'll do worse to that dragon.
translation.ja: ドラゴンのほうが もっとひどい目(め)に

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: なぜ？

translation.en: The Claws of the Imperium come from Imperium,
translation.ja: ヤツらはインペリウムから きてる

translation.en: same as me.
translation.ja: わたしと同(おな)じ

translation.en: And Imperium runs entirely on dragon power.
translation.ja: インぺリウムの動力(どうりょく)は ドラゴンのパワーよ

translation.en: With all these merged realms,
translation.ja: 世界(せかい)がマージしたあと

translation.en: I'm sure they're hunting dragons everywhere now.
translation.ja: そこらじゅうで ドラゴン狩(が)りをしてるはず

translation.en: But they say dragon power is safe.
translation.ja: ドラゴンのパワーは 安全(あんぜん)なんじゃ？

translation.en: Safe for who?
translation.ja: だれにとって？

translation.en: You saw the look in that dragon's eyes. It wanted to be free.
translation.ja: ドラゴンの目(め)をみたでしょ 自由(じゆう)になりたがってる

translation.en: Just like I did.
translation.ja: わたしみたいに

translation.en: So, uh, I've known you for a while now,
translation.ja: ソラと会(あ)って しばらくたつけど

translation.en: and you've always been pretty good with tech, but...
translation.ja: メカに強(つよ)い理由(りゆう)は？

translation.en: I have no idea.
translation.ja: じぶんでも わからない

translation.en: You turned pieces of the SA-Mark-1
translation.ja: キミはＳＡマークワンを とべるマシンに変(か)えた

translation.en: into a flying mech, in midair!
translation.ja: キミはＳＡマークワンを とべるマシンに変(か)えた しかも空中(くうちゅう)で！

translation.en: Yeah. That was weird, right?
translation.ja: わかってる やっぱり変(へん)だよね

translation.en: Well, that's one word for it.
translation.ja: ほかに いいかえるなら

translation.en: Other words would be amazing,
translation.ja: びっくりとか ありえないとか

translation.en: impossible, defying all logic or reason!
translation.ja: びっくりとか ありえないとか 理屈(りくつ)にあわないとかかな

translation.en: It was that dragon.
translation.ja: あのドラゴンよ

translation.en: I could feel it awaken something in me.
translation.ja: わたしの中(なか)で なにかが目(め)ざめたの

translation.en: Some kind of power.
translation.ja: パワーみたいなものが

translation.en: Like the Elemental Powers the Ninja had!
translation.ja: ニンジャの エレメント･パワーみたいだ

translation.en: Powers I've dreamed of having.
translation.ja: ぼくのあこがれのパワーだ

translation.en: Water, fire, ice.
translation.ja: 水(みず)　炎(ほのお)　氷(こおり)…

translation.en: Not everything is tied to your lost heroes, you know.
translation.ja: なんでも消(き)えたヒーローに むすびつけないで

translation.en: If I lose hope that the Ninja could come back,
translation.ja: ニンジャがもどってくる 希望(きぼう)をなくしたら

translation.en: then I lose hope my parents could come back.
translation.ja: 両親(りょうしん)がもどってくる希望(きぼう)も なくなる

translation.en: Hope is the only thing the Merge didn't take from me.
translation.ja: マージにうばわれてないのは 希望(きぼう)だけだ

translation.en: Well, hope won't be enough anymore.
translation.ja: 希望(きぼう)だけじゃ不十分(ふじゅうぶん)かもね

translation.en: We can't build you a new Ninja Monastery from an Imperium prison.
translation.ja: インペリウムの刑務所(けいむしょ)じゃ ニンジャ道場(どうじょう)もたてられない

translation.en: It's called the "Monastery of Spinjitzu."
translation.ja: 正確(せいかく)にはスピン術道場(じゅつどうじょう)だよ

translation.en: But you're right. The dream's over, isn't it?
translation.ja: でも たしかに 夢(ゆめ)はおわったみたいだ

translation.en: [claw 2] Wait. Aren't you...
translation.ja: まて　おまえは

translation.en: No way!
translation.ja: まさか！

translation.en: The Green Ninja.
translation.ja: グリーン･ニンジャ！

translation.en: I think that mask belongs to me.
translation.ja: そのマスクは ぼくのだよね？
